profiles:
Summary IT Professional currently working on 5 year contract with L-3 Communications on RCAS Program as Enterprise Service Desk Specialist and Remote System Administrator for US Army Reserve Command. Recent College grad from Old Dominion University in May 2011 with a Bachelor's in Computer Science and a minor in Mathematics. IT Consultant with 2 years of experience in public sector with IBM and 1 1/2 years in government at the US Joint Forces Command as a Student Engineer Intern. I have an active DoD Secret clearance from August 2013. Main interests are cyber security, network engineering, system administration, intelligence, counter terrorism, and ethical hacking. I'm looking for an entry to mid level or developmental position that will challenge me and utilize my background in network security and system administration while also giving me opportunities to pursue my primary interest of cyber security.  
 
Main Skills and Experience: 
 
*Command Line Basics (Windows and Linux) 
 
*ITIL v3 Foundations Certified (August 2014) 
 
*CompTIA Security+ Certified, DoD 8570.01 IAT Level II (June 2014) 
 
*Infrastructure Support Specialist (Network Troubleshooting, Help Desk, and System Administration) 
 
*VMware vSphere 4.1 and Infrastructure Client Experience (Create Virtual Machines, Migrate Hosts, Install Applications, Deploy VM from template, Create Template, Physical to Virtual Conversion) 
 
*Change Management Experience (ClearQuest and Change Requests) 
 
*Help Desk Experience (Install Software, Configure Applications, Re-Image Machines, Network Troubleshooting, Moving Users, Setup Email, Active Directory, Printer Initialization, VDI Support) 
 
*Windows System Administration Experience, (Basic Active Directory, Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows Server 2003/2008, Network Troubleshooting, WSUS Server, Volume License Server)

Summary Welcome to my Profile. 
How are you doing?  
 
Allow me to ask you this question: 
How do you use Information Technology to create value now and how do you ensure that your IT is able to help you create value in the future? 
 
I'm curious about how you see the future and deal with the uncertainty it brings. 
I also have a keen interest in how people - and the organizations that they form - deal with an ever-changing environment, how they work together to utilize Information Technology to take advantage of change and how they learn and grow. 
 
My specific area of interest is practical implementations of Information Security Management Systems. I make sure that your individual implementation provides the necessary awareness and the relevant information to all your stakeholders to help you create the best possible balance between a potential gain and the mitigation of the risks linked to that gain. 
 
As a Security Professional I work with people and technology to create and implement an Information Security Management System that supports you and your team to gain a better situational awareness, to use your resources efficiently, and to provide you with the capacity to respond. You'll become aware of how to protect the value that you create at the moment, but especially about how you can ensure that you can create long-term value in the changing and uncertain times that lie ahead of you. 
 
My focus is you, your team and your environment. I support you in finding new ways of utilizing IT-Security to protect, support and grow your business and to generate revenue by means of assessing, innovating, validating, and implementing your Information Security Management System. I boost your IT-Security strategy development process and business alignment in order to accelerate growth and enhance results. 
 
To achieve these targets I utilize my extensive experience covering strategy and governance, offensive and defensive IT security techniques, security operations and incident response. Summary Welcome to my Profile.
